page.title: 03OUR HEADMASTER AT SHREWTON
page.content: Our Headmaster is called Mr Hunter, he lives in a house called 'Culverhayes' with his wife, who is a teacher at Stonehenge School, Amesbury, and Ian and Sarah their children. Mr Hunter is an expert with computers and is always ready to help sort out new programs. He teaches Maths to the 3rd year junior group. One of his hobbies is Photography and many excellent pictures and films have been taken of school children at work and play. He is also an enthusiastic rambler, and with his family has explored many walks around this country and on the Continent. On Tuesdays after school he runs a keen group of young ornothologists and his extensive knowledge of birdlife has aroused great, interest amongst the children of the club.
